sentences.en: a vociferous critic of the president's stance
sentences.cn: 猛烈批评总统所持态度的人

sentences.en: Alexander Lazarus is a food critic for the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大·拉扎勒斯是为该报撰稿的饮食评论家。

sentences.en: Arnold Schwarzenegger's new restaurant has been slated by a top food critic.
sentences.cn: 阿诺德·施瓦辛格的新餐馆受到了一位顶级食评家的恶评。

sentences.en: Asmus became friendly with a number of writers and appeared in print as a literary critic.
sentences.cn: 阿斯穆斯和许多作家成为了好友，而且还作为一名文学评论家出现在报纸上。

sentences.en: Critics of the scheme have said that it will not solve the problem of teenage crime.
sentences.cn: 此项计划的批评者说它解决不了青少年犯罪问题。

sentences.en: He was a stern critic but an extremely kindly man.
sentences.cn: 他是个苛刻的批评家，但却是个非常善良的人。

sentences.en: I left Oxford in 1961 hungry to be a critic.
sentences.cn: 我于1961年离开牛津，渴望成为一名评论家。

sentences.en: I'm my own most severe critic.
sentences.cn: 我对自己要求非常严格.

sentences.en: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.cn: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

sentences.en: Mather was film critic on the Daily Telegraph for many years.
sentences.cn: 马瑟多年来一直担任《每日电讯报》的影评人。

sentences.en: One vehement critic is Michael Howard.
sentences.cn: 其中一位言辞激烈的评论家是迈克尔·霍华德。

sentences.en: She is one of the ruling party's most outspoken critics.
sentences.cn: 她是最直言不讳地批评执政党的一个人。

sentences.en: So far from admitting his own mistake, he falsely accused his critic.
sentences.cn: 他非但不认错, 还倒打一耙.

sentences.en: The critic padded out the review with quotation from the author.
sentences.cn: 这个评论家引用那个作家的话添凑了这篇评论.

sentences.en: The critic's review of the play was just a paragraph of bile.
sentences.cn: 那位批评家对这部戏剧的评论不过是在发泄怒气。

sentences.en: The last thing we need are words of wisdom from an armchair critic.
sentences.cn: 我们最不需要的是纸上谈兵的评论家发表的“智慧”言论。

sentences.en: The newspaper has been one of the most consistent critics ever of the government.
sentences.cn: 该报纸是政府最坚持的批评者之一。

sentences.en: Turner is a writer and critic.
Why not have it out with your critic, discuss the whole thing face to face?
sentences.cn: 为什么不和批评你的人讲个明白，面对面地把整件事情谈一谈呢？
